title: The root schema
description: The root schema comprises the entire JSON document.

BL-MESSAGE-ID.title: The BL-MESSAGE-ID schema
BL-MESSAGE-ID.description: Unique Shipment ID has to be put into this field. It should not be the BL Number because in case of changing the carrier the message would not be found in the time-triggered database. For House BLs this field should contain the BL MESSAGE ID (contains Master BL Shipment ID).

HOUSE-BL-RUNNING-NUMBER.title: The HOUSE-BL-RUNNING-NUMBER schema
HOUSE-BL-RUNNING-NUMBER.description: To guarantee the correct sequence of the House BLs for a Master-BL..

ETD-DATE.title: The ETD-DATE schema
ETD-DATE.description: Date expected to depart in YYYYMMDD format. If not available use 00000000.

ETD-TIME.title: The ETD-TIME schema
ETD-TIME.description: Time expected to depart in HHMM format. If not available use 0000.

TIME-ZONE.title: The TIME-ZONE schema
TIME-ZONE.description: Timezone of shipping office eg GMT.

ETA-DATE.title: The ETA-DATE schema
ETA-DATE.description: Date expected to arrive in YYYYMMDD format. If not available use 00000000.

ETA-TIME.title: The ETA-TIME schema
ETA-TIME.description: Time expected to arrive in HHMM format. If not available use 0000.

CR-DATE.title: The CR-DATE schema
CR-DATE.description: Date message was created in YYYYMMDD format.

CR-TIME.title: The CR-TIME schema
CR-TIME.description: Time message was created in HHMM format. If not available use 0000

HOUSE-BL-USING-CODE.title: The HOUSE-BL-USING-CODE schema
HOUSE-BL-USING-CODE.description: O - Data sent by branch owning shipment, F - Data sent by a branch not owning the shipment.

NATURE-OF-GOODS.title: The NATURE-OF-GOODS schema
NATURE-OF-GOODS.description: Nature of goods: GEN - General or HAZ - Hazardous.

FINAL-DESTINATION-BRANCH.title: The FINAL-DESTINATION-BRANCH schema
FINAL-DESTINATION-BRANCH.description: Schenker Code appended by the Code SSF for SeaFreight.

STATUS.title: The STATUS schema
STATUS.description: BL Version Number - Defaulted by Schenker Mapping.

HEADER.title: The HEADER schema
HEADER.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

DOCUMENT-CODE.title: The DOCUMENT-CODE schema
DOCUMENT-CODE.description: Document Code: 703 - House BL, 704 - Master BL, 705 - Direct BL.

MESSAGE-ID.title: The MESSAGE-ID schema
MESSAGE-ID.description: BL Message Identification. Bill of Lading Number.

DOCUMENT-PLACE.title: The DOCUMENT-PLACE schema
DOCUMENT-PLACE.description: UN location code for place of issue of BOL.

DOCUMENT-DATE.title: The DOCUMENT-DATE schema
DOCUMENT-DATE.description: Date the document was issued in format YYYYMMDD.

NUMBER-OF-ORIGINALS.title: The NUMBER-OF-ORIGINALS schema
NUMBER-OF-ORIGINALS.description: Number of Originals of document to be issued.

anyOf.title: The first anyOf schema
anyOf.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

THEADER.title: The THEADER schema
THEADER.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

MODE-OF-TRANSPORT.title: The MODE-OF-TRANSPORT schema
MODE-OF-TRANSPORT.description: Code identifying the mode of transport: 10 - Maritime Transport.

TYPE-OF-TRANSPORT.title: The TYPE-OF-TRANSPORT schema
TYPE-OF-TRANSPORT.description: Code identifying the type of transport: 11 - Ship, 13 = Ocean Vessel.

TRANSPORT-ID.title: The TRANSPORT-ID schema
TRANSPORT-ID.description: Name of the vessel or ship.

TDATES.title: The TDATES schema
TDATES.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

TDATE.title: The TDATE schema
TDATE.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

TRANSPORT-QUALIFIER.title: The TRANSPORT-QUALIFIER schema
TRANSPORT-QUALIFIER.description:
Code identifying type of date: 11 = Shipped on Board Date, 118 = Booked at Date (= Confirmed at)
132 = Estimated Date of Arrival, 133 = Estimated Date of Departure. 136 = Departure Date

TRANSPORT-DATE-FORMAT.title: The TRANSPORT-DATE-FORMAT schema
TRANSPORT-DATE-FORMAT.description: Code identifying the date Format: 102 - YYYYMMDD

PLACE-QUALIFIER.title: The PLACE-QUALIFIER schema
PLACE-QUALIFIER.description: Code identifying type of place referred to.

ADDRESS-QUALIFIER.title: The ADDRESS-QUALIFIER schema
ADDRESS-QUALIFIER.description: Code definining the party the address belongs to.

NUMBER-OF-PACKAGES.title: The NUMBER-OF-PACKAGES schema
NUMBER-OF-PACKAGES.description: The number of packages in this unit.

MEASURE-QUALIFIER.title: The MEASURE-QUALIFIER schema
MEASURE-QUALIFIER.description: define type of weight being measured - WT/ VOL.

MEASURE-UNIT.title: Unit of measure
MEASURE-UNIT.description: Units of Measure: KGM - Kilogram, MTQ - Cubic meters.

PACKAGE.title: The PACKAGE schema
PACKAGE.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

TOTAL-NUMBER-PACKAGES.title: The TOTAL-NUMBER-PACKAGES schema
TOTAL-NUMBER-PACKAGES.description: The total number of packages for the shipment.

TOTAL-GROSS-WEIGHT.title: The TOTAL-GROSS-WEIGHT schema
TOTAL-GROSS-WEIGHT.description: Total Gross weight for the shipment.

WEIGHT-MEASURE-QUALIFIER.title: The WEIGHT-MEASURE-QUALIFIER schema
WEIGHT-MEASURE-QUALIFIER.description: The units that the weight is expressed in: KGM - Kilograms.

TOTAL-CUBE.title: The TOTAL-CUBE schema
TOTAL-CUBE.description: The number of cubic meters the shipment represents.

CUBE-MEASURE-QUALIFIER.title: The CUBE-MEASURE-QUALIFIER schema
CUBE-MEASURE-QUALIFIER.description: The units the cubic weight is expressed in: MTQ - Cubic Meters.

EQUIPMENT-QUALIFIER.title: The EQUIPMENT-QUALIFIER schema
EQUIPMENT-QUALIFIER.description: Code identifying equipment: CN - Container, E - Trailer.

EQUIPMENT-ID-NUMBER.title: The EQUIPMENT-ID-NUMBER schema
EQUIPMENT-ID-NUMBER.description: The Equipment id number eg. container number.

SUPPLIER.title: The SUPPLIER schema
SUPPLIER.description: Code to identify who supplied the equipment: 1 - Shipper, 2 - Carrier.

MEASURE-QUALIFIER.title: The MEASURE-QUALIFIER schema
MEASURE-QUALIFIER.description: Code identifying type of weight being reported on.

MEASURE-DIMENSION-CODE.title: The MEASURE-DIMENSION-CODE schema
MEASURE-DIMENSION-CODE.description: Code identifying what is being measured: T - Tare Weight, U - Unit weight (Container & Content).

TERMS-OF-DELIVERY-CODE.title: The TERMS-OF-DELIVERY-CODE schema
TERMS-OF-DELIVERY-CODE.description: IncoTerm code identifying the delivery terms.

TERMS-OF-DELIVERY-TEXT-1.title: The TERMS-OF-DELIVERY-TEXT-1 schema
TERMS-OF-DELIVERY-TEXT-1.description: Delivery terms incl locn eg EXW ANTRIM.
